Entries.Mon10: Never would've thought I'd find happiness with a human.$4#$b#You're a true pearl amongst the swine, kjaere.$1
Entries.Tue10: I caught a golden trout today, and it made me think of you.$1#$b#Sorry, that was meant to be a compliment. Yeh, it needs work, I know.$2
Entries.summer_Mon10: Greetings @! I was about to take a dip in the lake. Want to join me?$1
Entries.summer_Thu10: I've closed myself off to your world for so long, I must've missed so much.#$b#Do you have {{random:flying vehicles, personal robots, telepathy}} yet?#$b#No? Oh, that's a disappointment.$2
Entries.fall_Mon10: Ah, kjaere, your eyes are as beautiful as your face.$4#$b#And yes, I very much love to make you laugh.$1
Entries.winter_Mon10: Care to join me by the fire for a night of mead, stories and song?$1#$b#I'm sure you have many fine tales to tell!$4

Entries.57877010/f Eyvinder 2000/A DeathOfOldGru: none/8 7/Eyvinder 7 5 2 LittleGruff 6 6 1 farmer -100 -100 0/showFrame LittleGruff 19/showFrame Eyvinder 23/pause 500/warp farmer 8 11/pause 500/showFrame LittleGruff 5/advancedMove LittleGruff false 2 0 0 1 2 100/move farmer 0 -3 0/playSound goat/showFrame Eyvinder 22/speak Eyvinder "Oh, it's you. Hello @. Can't say I expected to see you today. Aren't humans allergic to rain?"/pause 500/emote farmer 36/move Eyvinder 0 1 2/advancedMove farmer false -1 0 0 -1 4 100/faceDirection LittleGruff 3/jump LittleGruff 3/pause 100/jump LittleGruff 3/speak Eyvinder "Dunno why you keep bothering to visit a grumpy old goat like me. Ain't no reward in it for you.$2"/jump LittleGruff 3/pause 100/jump LittleGruff 3/quickQuestion #Your company is reward enough.#Stop pretending, I know you appreciate my visits.#I like 'grumpy old goats'.#I don't know why I bothered either. But I did, so there.(break)emote Eyvinder 20\speak Eyvinder "Hah! You're really a glutton for punishment, ain't ya?$1"(break)emote Eyvinder 12\speak Eyvinder "Okay yeh... you've nailed the truth on the head there, @, and uncovered my darkest secret.$1"(break)emote Eyvinder 32\speak Eyvinder "Well, there ain't no accounting for taste.$1"(break)emote Eyvinder 12\speak Eyvinder "Gotta respect your honesty, @.$1"/pause 500/emote Eyvinder 40/jump LittleGruff 3/pause 100/jump LittleGruff 3/speak Eyvinder "Well, I can't say I ain't glad to see you, lad.^Well, I can't say I ain't glad to see you, lass.#$b#Truth is, it does get a wee bit lonely up here...$2#$b#...not that you heard me admit that, mind.$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 56/faceDirection Eyvinder 1/jump LittleGruff 3/pause 100/jump LittleGruff 3/pause 500/faceDirection Eyvinder 2/speak Eyvinder "And I do miss the old days...when it was me and my team...#$b#Hmmm, I wonder what old George is up to these days? You wouldn't happen to know, would you, @?"/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 1000/end
